body_html:
@mkummer225 I haven't tried to build Caffe2, but Pytorch will build and run (my users haven't notified me of anything that is broken) if make the change noted below. While this may not be the official solution (I'm not aware of their plan to fix it) it may work for you temporarily.

diff --git a/.gitmodules b/.gitmodules
index 0d88b7d..7b03885 100644
--- a/.gitmodules
+++ b/.gitmodules
@@ -22,7 +22,7 @@
        url = https://github.com/NVlabs/cub.git
 [submodule "third_party/eigen"]
        path = third_party/eigen
-       url = https://github.com/RLovelett/eigen.git
+       url = https://github.com/eigenteam/eigen-git-mirror.git
 [submodule "third_party/googletest"]
        path = third_party/googletest
        url = https://github.com/google/googletest.git

@mkummer225 I haven't tried to build Caffe2, but Pytorch will build and run (my users haven't notified me of anything that is broken) if make the change noted below. While this may not be the official solution (I'm not aware of their plan to fix it) it may work for you temporarily.
diff --git a/.gitmodules b/.gitmodules
index 0d88b7d..7b03885 100644
--- a/.gitmodules
+++ b/.gitmodules
@@ -22,7 +22,7 @@
        url = https://github.com/NVlabs/cub.git

body:
@mkummer225 I haven't tried to build Caffe2, but Pytorch will build and run (my users haven't notified me of anything that is broken) if make the change noted below. While this may not be the official solution (I'm not aware of their plan to fix it) it may work for you temporarily.

```
diff --git a/.gitmodules b/.gitmodules
index 0d88b7d..7b03885 100644
--- a/.gitmodules
+++ b/.gitmodules
@@ -22,7 +22,7 @@
        url = https://github.com/NVlabs/cub.git
 [submodule "third_party/eigen"]
        path = third_party/eigen
-       url = https://github.com/RLovelett/eigen.git
+       url = https://github.com/eigenteam/eigen-git-mirror.git
 [submodule "third_party/googletest"]
        path = third_party/googletest
        url = https://github.com/google/googletest.git
```
